comment._content: Eva Moore and Henry Vernon Esmond

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Henry Vernon Esmond (1869-1922), b. Jack Esmond, English actor/playwright. Eva Moore (1870-1955) was his English wife and co-star. Their daughter Jill Esmond was Laurence Olivier's first wife. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_V._Esmond en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eva_Moore en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jill_Esmond
